    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3128</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 28: he had a dream</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Nr. 28: er hatte einen Traum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Non 28 : il a eu un 
rêve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - No. 28: teve um 
sonho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - No 28: ha avuto un 
sogno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 28: είχε ένα όνειρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - No 28: él tenía 
un sueño</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An internet based writing activity where the student learns more about Martin Luther King and his six dreams.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">information retrieval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Martin Luther King</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet gründete Schreiben Aktivität, in 
der der Kursteilnehmer mehr über Martin Luther König und seine sechs
Träume erlernt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Internet a basé l'activité d'écriture où 
l'étudiant apprend plus au sujet du roi de Martin Luther et de ses 
six rêves.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Internet baseou a atividade da escrita onde o 
estudante aprende mais sobre o rei de Martin Luther e os seus seis 
sonhos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Internet ha basato l'attività di scrittura 
dove l'allievo impara più circa il re del Martin Luther ed i suoi sei
sogni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα Διαδίκτυο βάσισε τη δραστηριότητα γραψίματος 
όπου ο σπουδαστής μαθαίνει περισσότερων για Martin Luther 
King και έξι όνειρά του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Internet basó la actividad de la escritura 
donde el estudiante aprende más sobre el rey de Martin Luther y sus 
seis sueños.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
